info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 5:30PM CDT until June 07 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR WESTERN JACKSON COUNTY... At 530 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Woodville, or 10 miles west of Scottsboro, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Scottsboro, Hollywood, Skyline, Section, Woodville, Pleasant Groves, Paint Rock, Lim Rock, Trenton and Garth. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
